articles.title: US consumer confidence hits lowest level since July 2022 - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Economic optimism from Americans fell sharply in April as inflation sticks around and the outlook on the job market sours.
articles.content:
Consumer confidence fell sharply in April as inflation worries and a downbeat outlook on the job market pushed optimism to its lowest level since 2022.
